title: Did the police find bodies in the freezers with a "black life material " that was pushed into their skin?
subtitle: Reports that a Chicago man named Rashid Thompson was arrested for bodies found in his refrigerator in the basement were not real.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Police in Los Angeles discovered 12 or 19 bodies in a refrigerator with Black Lives Mater carved into the skin of the victims.
